001package com.fns.grivet.config;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004
005import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
006import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
009
010import springfox.documentation.builders.PathSelectors;
011import springfox.documentation.builders.RequestHandlerSelectors;
012import springfox.documentation.service.ApiInfo;
013import springfox.documentation.service.Contact;
014import springfox.documentation.service.VendorExtension;
015import springfox.documentation.spi.DocumentationType;
016import springfox.documentation.spring.web.plugins.Docket;
017import springfox.documentation.swagger2.annotations.EnableSwagger2;
018
019@Profile("swagger")
020@Configuration
021@EnableSwagger2
022public class SwaggerConfig {
023
024    @Bean
025    public Docket api(
026            @Value("${info.title}") String projectName,
027            @Value("${info.description}") String projectDescription) {
028        return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2)
029          .select()
030          .apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.fns.grivet.controller"))
031          .paths(PathSelectors.any())
032          .build()
033              .apiInfo(apiInfo(projectName, projectDescription));
034    }
035
036    private ApiInfo apiInfo(
037            String projectName,
038            String projectDescription) {
039        ApiInfo apiInfo = new ApiInfo(
040                "%s REST API".formatted(projectName),
041          projectDescription,
042          "v1",
043          "https://github.com/fastnsilver/grivet/blob/master/TERMS",
044          new Contact("Chris Phillipson", "http://techblitz.io/grivet/", "fastnsilver@gmail.com"),
045          "Apache License 2.0",
046          "https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0",
047          new ArrayList<VendorExtension>());
048        return apiInfo;
049    }
050}
